publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5692.1 Mrs Nanette Milne: Tackling Alcohol Misuseâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-5692) in the name of Mr Kenny MacAskill, leave out from "and calls" to end and insert "recognises that an increase in the number of police walking the streets would help to enforce the law, and welcomes the recent partnership between the Scottish Executive, the Scotch Whisky Association and eight other trade associations representing alcohol producers and retailers to tackle alcohol abuse."
